text: 1.16: Ef 6.17; Hi 4.12; VB 1.20; 2.1; 2.12; 2.16; 3.1; 19.15; 19.21Ana harathɨgi ŋkaa, ana won guva haren nta suirigi. Anan kamthoon, gu gari, ntari ga mbui kos, ana kamthoon hɨgim, ana ana ŋgɨɨgi, ana guigira bɨrgiap, ana bɨrtɨk ndereni vhɨra ki. Ana ana kamthoon kega kɨrar hi. Anan khom, ana guigira ŋgarav, ra guigira sharav, havhargi fara muuŋgi. Zon harathɨgi gorar muunga raa gari. (1.12)
